articles.description: Popular brokerage firms, such as Goldman Sachs and JP Morgan are optimistic about the growth of SBI stock. They have suggested that the stock would soon hit the Rs 700 mark.
articles.content:
Many domestic and global brokerages are bullish on the State Bank of India stock after the largest public sector lender reported strong Q2 results.
